message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident it's worth every penny to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand your product is valuable, but I am only able to pay up to $12000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to come down to $13000. This reflects the value of the product for both of us. Let's work together to make this happen!
